statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -2 \\ 3 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 1 \\ 1 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 0 \\ 3 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \\ 5 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 8 \\ 5 \\ -18 \\ -7 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -15 \\ -6 \\ 5 \\ -13 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
